Title: Bauchi closes public, private schools over insecurity
Summary: Bauchi State Government has announced the closure of primary, secondary, and higher institutions across the state over the rising insecurity in the North . The Spokesperson of the Ministry of Education, Jalaludeen Usman, in a statement on Sunday night, said .

Title: Lagos-Calabar Highway: Court strikes out suit against FG for lack of jurisdiction
Summary: Justice Akintayo Aluko of the Federal High Court has struck out a suit filed by Winhomes Estate Global Services Ltd . The suit was filed against the Attorney-General of the Federation and Minister of Justice and four others over the Lagos-Calabar Highway .

Title: LASG to deploy N244.82b bond proceeds into key sectors
Summary: LASG to deploy N244.82b bond proceeds into critical infrastructure development . The funds will be invested in key sectors, including transportation, housing, environmental sustainability, healthcare, and education .

Title: Court orders FG to publish NDDC forensic report, name indicted persons
Summary: Federal High Court orders FG to publish NDDC forensic report, name indicted persons . President Bola Tinubu must direct the office of the Attorney General of the Federation and Minister of Justice to publish the names of those indicted in the report .

Title: How racketeering worsens low-income earners’ housing crisis
Summary: Experts agree that without urgent action through digitisation, regulation, enforcement, and consumer protection, sharp practices in the housing sector will continue to exploit low-income earners .

Title: (Black Market) Dollar to Naira exchange rate today, Monday November 24, 2025
Summary: The Nigerian currency, the Naira, opened the week with continued pressure in the unofficial foreign exchange market, commonly known as the black market or parallel market .

Title: PDP leadership moves to reconcile with Sule Lamido
Summary: PDP leadership urged Lamido to work closely with Chairman Turaki . Both men have long enjoyed cordial relations and can still steer the party away from internal strife .

Title: Troops neutralise seven terrorists, recover ammunition in renewed offensive
Summary: Troops neutralise seven terrorists, recover ammunition in renewed offensive . An ambush by troops of 192 Battalion and hybrid forces at Gwadale general area in Pulka–Gwoza axis led to the killing of four terrorists .

Title: Dollar to Naira exchange rate today, November 24, 2025
Summary: The naira traded at about ₦1,456 to the US dollar in the Nigerian Foreign Exchange Market (NFEM) on Monday, November 24, 2025 .

Title: Troops intensify search, rescue for abducted students, dismantle bandits’ camps
Summary: Troops intensify search, rescue for abducted schoolchildren in Niger, Kebbi and Zamfara states . Troops operating under Operation FANSAN YAMMA (OPFY) have intensified search-and-rescue operations .
